tasks.label: Jekyll: Serve
tasks.command: (sleep 2; open -a Safari http://127.0.0.1:4000) & rbenv exec bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --host 127.0.0.1

tasks.label: Jekyll: Build
tasks.command: rbenv exec bundle exec jekyll build

tasks.label: Doctor: Env
tasks.command: echo RUBY=$(ruby -v); echo BUNDLE=$(bundle -v); which ruby; which bundle
